mapper.update:
update user_guest
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
photo = #{photo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
wechat = #{wechat,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
golds = #{golds,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=BIT},
adder = #{adder,jdbcType=INTEGER},
addtime = #{addtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
moder = #{moder,jdbcType=INTEGER},
modtime = #{modtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where guestid = #{guestid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update user_guest set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, photo = #{photo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wechat = #{wechat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, golds = #{golds,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, adder = #{adder,jdbcType=INTEGER}, addtime = #{addtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, moder = #{moder,jdbcType=INTEGER}, modtime = #{modtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where guestid = #{guestid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
